query:
ALTER TABLE community_posts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isAnonymous BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isPinned BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS likeCount INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS commentCount INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS viewCount INT DEFAULT 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3m3D5MrqCAAiYaH.7eade5d3e49c --database gNzS4NBHx5vTrMncCSQSeJ --execute ALTER TABLE community_posts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isAnonymous BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isPinned BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS likeCount INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS commentCount INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS viewCount INT DEFAULT 0;
